name: The MannequinZ
description:
Your an operator that has been sent to a lab that has been experimenting with mannequins its your job to find out what there doing .  

Some of the mannequins have gotten free before they could block it off, Its your job to eliminate the source but be warned they are attracted to the flashy lights on your weapons and your flashlight does not go far so your weapon lights are one of the only viable light sources you have. But they can detect you that far so when they come after you from your weapon flash you can dart away. But your flash sometimes wont go off because of the guns old hardware waring down. So don't think its safe.

CONTROLS-w,a,s,d to move ,  1,2 and scroll wheel to switch weapons. Left mouse to fire weapons and f for flashlight.

PROTOTYPE-Testing out a game idea.  May be  a little buggy
